item.title: English-Answers 09/10/2020
item.description: Question of the day _answers.08-10-2020 Irregular Verbs Infiinitive form to simple past tense and past participle. e.g. choose- chose - chosen swim- swam - swum rise - rose - risen lead - led - led lie - lay - lain cut - cut - cut grow - grew - grown mean - meant - meant win - won - won build - built - built
